root.text:
*1DC NB L7*
*Spend: $6,200*
*Revenue: $804*
*ROAS: .13* (-35.58%)
*CAC: $3,100 (+30.90%)* 
Updates and next steps
• The body sculpt focused funnel has started off well both in platform and in NB.
    ◦ In platform: 4.54 ROAS $73 CAC
    ◦ NB clicks only: .68 ROAS 
    ◦ Awareness metrics: 62.3% LP view rate, .72 CPC. We will look to refresh this campaign to keep driving these metrics 
• In the pipeline is our full high aov product funnel
    ◦ We'll launch this if body sculpt falls off/budget supports!
Traffic campaigns in June (Roughly 12% of spend this week)
• .35 CPC, 1.56% CTR and a Landing page view rate 66.14%
<https://projects.motionapp.com/snapshot/1c57f4ef-091a-473c-9802-ac496beffacb|Creative Report>
• 027 V4 is our top performer in platform and on NB. The sound and text overlay are both key factors here. The background sound is consistent in the top performing body sculpt creatives

elements.text: The body sculpt focused funnel has started off well both in platform and in NB.
Awareness metrics: 62.3% LP view rate, .72 CPC. We will look to refresh this campaign to keep driving these metrics
In the pipeline is our full high aov product funnel
We'll launch this if body sculpt falls off/budget supports!
Traffic campaigns in June (Roughly 12% of spend this week)
.35 CPC, 1.56% CTR and a Landing page view rate 66.14%
027 V4 is our top performer in platform and on NB. The sound and text overlay are both key factors here. The background sound is consistent in the top performing body sculpt creatives

messages.text: Hey <@U0913R7KB7E> happy Friday! Please see <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1i0FND-8p7CjiRzOjRk0AFC7nRfWXxWwSbYZHzLhYf1A/edit?usp=sharing|here> for our Tiktok relationship to the other channels and business as a whole. Happy to pull anymore numbers and explain this further anytime. Definitely some interesting insights here! We are prepared to take action on turning off the SPC and launching a red light mask specific funnel, but decided to hold for feedback. Let us know what you think. Thank you and have a great weekend! CC <@U04PHVC4WJH>

messages.text: I've added access

Hey <@U0913R7KB7E> and team, our Shopping campaign has had a bit of drop off in spends and revenue recently, so I did a little digging and noticed that _bundles_ were the primary cause. I believe the bundle images which are synced to GMC showcases the evergreen offer, and because of this, GMC has disapproved those SKUs as promotional imagery is not allowed in Google Shopping placements. Would you guys be able to provide <mailto:rahul@sharmabrands.com|rahul@sharmabrands.com> and <mailto:berkeley@sharmabrands.com|berkeley@sharmabrands.com> admin access to your GMC, and also provide us alternate image links for each bundle that's live on-site, which doesn't showcase the offer?
Thanks in advance!
cc: <@U04PHVC4WJH> <@UA8FED08G>

messages.text:
Hey <@U0824M6DHLK> (cc: <@U0913R7KB7E>), we met with our Google rep Tori yesterday and here’s what we aligned on—sharing for visibility:
• We’ll let the *Pmax scaling test* run for 30 days (from June 19 until July 18), then scale down any campaigns that aren’t driving incremental revenue post scale.
 • On July 12 (after Prime Day), we’ll *increase the target ROAS* on one Pmax campaign by +15% and monitor for around 2 weeks before deciding whether to roll this out to other campaigns.
 • *Demand Gen scaling to $500/day* will realistically need about 6 weeks for proper learning according to Tori. Let us know if you guys are down to up the budget to $500/day from the current $300/day.
 • Waiting on Tori to confirm what the *ToF YT Reach/Traffic investment* will look like.
cc: <@U04PHVC4WJH>

messages.text:
Hey <@U0824M6DHLK> and <@UA8FED08G>, sharing through our *search impression share and CPC insights* for brand and non-brand (product) terms.

*Core Brand - Screenshot 1*
• Defending brand terms very well with an impression share consistently over 90%, over the last 8+ weeks.
• <http://amazon.com|amazon.com> and <http://healthyline.com|healthyline.com> have increased impression share over the last 4 weeks, indicating higher bidding on our brand terms. 
*Sauna Blanket (Non-Brand / Product-Specific) - Screenshot 2*
• Defending market share well - still the market leader. <http://amazon.com|amazon.com> is our main competitor in the space. 
• CPCs seem to be normalizing over the last 3 weeks, showcasing a slow return to an evergreen state
*Red Light Hat (Non-Brand / Product-Specific) - Screenshot 3*
• Market leaders <http://irestorelaser.com|irestorelaser.com> and <http://kiierr.com|kiierr.com> have seen a significant drop in impression share over the last 2 weeks. Possibly due to scaling down drastically post promos. Showcases a need to scale significantly during sale periods to remain competitive with them.
• Competitors like <http://schoolofdermatology.com|schoolofdermatology.com> and <http://omniluxled.com|omniluxled.com> have managed to improve their share in the space and a new competitor has entered the auction house (<http://hoogahealth.com|hoogahealth.com>) 
• We want to scale this campaign by 20% this week to assess if we can capture some additional impression share, traffic and conversions. 
*PEMF Mat (Non-Brand / Product-Specific) - Screenshot 4*
• We remain market leaders in the space despite scaling down drastically in June. This indicates strong performance during evergreen periods. We also recently launched new ad copy under the PEMF ad group aimed at improving quality scores and impression share which seems to be working well in defending our share. 
• <http://magnawavepemf.com|magnawavepemf.com> remains our biggest competitor in the space. 
• CPCs are dropping / stabilizing, indicating a slow return to an evergreen state. 
Let us know if you have any questions :relaxed: cc: <@U04PHVC4WJH> <@U029WD39C0Z>
